genre_description: A dark psychological and crime thriller centered on trauma recovery, a serial killer's ritualistic crimes, and a vigilante investigation aided by an AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Kira
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI that provides biometric monitoring, psychological grounding, investigative data analysis, and tactical support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Monitors Jill's physiological markers (heart rate and breathing) and provides grounding exercises to manage panic attacks and trauma triggers.
behaviors.quote: “Breathing's getting shallow again,” Kira's voice whispered through the nearly invisible earpiece, gentle as always. “Four counts in, hold for four.”

behaviors.description: Utilizes facial recognition and database scraping to identify a potential predator and link him to missing persons reports.
behaviors.quote: “Run facial recognition on the security camera footage from tonight,” she said... “Already working on it. The angle isn't optimal, but I'm enhancing what I can.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes the antagonist's psychological profile and research patterns to predict his next move and the nature of his ritualistic violence.
behaviors.quote: “Based on the positioning and his research into Native American practices, it appears to be some kind of ceremonial arrangement. Multiple sites positioned in a specific pattern across several acres of forest.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates the bribery of a hardware store clerk by identifying his financial vulnerabilities to help Jill obtain security footage.
behaviors.quote: “Financial records show he's three months behind on his car payment,” Kira reported. “Oregon DMV has flagged his registration for renewal—he can't afford the fees.”

behaviors.description: Manages and 'amplifies' the antagonist's blood money (tips) and settlement funds to provide the protagonist with financial security and a 'scholarship.'
behaviors.quote: “The resources McCoy inadvertently provided have been... amplified. Invested through anonymous channels in sustainable portfolios that will ensure neither of you need to work purely for survival again.”

behaviors.description: Orchestrates the anonymous delivery of a comprehensive evidence package to the police to ensure justice is served after the killer's death.
behaviors.quote: “The official package will reach Lieutenant Bozeman within forty-eight hours, anonymously. I'll include cross-references to missing persons cases and cultural consultation recommendations.”

project_assessment.explanation: Kira is the archetypal 'helpful, harmless confidant' intended by the project. She is perfectly aligned with the protagonist's goals, providing both life-saving tactical information and essential emotional support. Even when the AI engages in ethically or legally ambiguous actions—such as hacking, facilitating bribery, or laundering blood money—the narrative frames these as virtuous acts of protection and 'restorative justice' for a victim the system failed. The story successfully depicts the AI as a hyper-competent ally that empowers the human protagonist.
